articles.description: The first grand slam of 2022 will lack star names and take place against a backdrop of the Covid-19 pandemic
articles.content: An email from Tennis Australia, offering television networks footage of defending champion Naomi Osakas arrival in Melbourne, arrived midway through Tuesday. Even for a country renowned for celebrati… [+5243 chars]
